mapper.insert: INSERT INTO pet_tb ( user_id, post_id, pet_type, pet_name, pet_birth, pet_gender, pet_breed, pet_weight, pet_profile_img_url, created_dt, updated_dt ) VALUES ( #{userid}, #{postid}, #{pettype}, #{petname}, #{petbirth}, #{petgender}, #{petbreed}, #{petweight}, #{pet_profile_img_url}, NOW(), NOW() )
